sentences.english: Please complete registration form below and turn into your teacher or PTA .
sentences.chinese: 請詳細填寫報名表後交給班級老師或家長會。

sentences.english: I know many things about English class and our homestay family .
sentences.chinese: 我知道了很多語言班級和我的寄宿家庭的一些事情。

sentences.english: His class is a five-good one.
sentences.chinese: 他的班級是個五好班級。

sentences.english: His class is a five-good one.
sentences.chinese: 他的班級是個五好班級。

sentences.english: Most children were not allowed to check blood glucose levels or administer insulin in class.
sentences.chinese: 大多數兒童不允許在班級監測血糖值及注射胰島素。

sentences.english: After school, I went to Maxine's classroom to ask her wether my wallet is at home.
sentences.chinese: 放學時，我到阿妹的班級問問她有沒有看見我的錢包。

sentences.english: Second, a disproportional rate of male and female students in one class is conducive to class discipline and learning effect.
sentences.chinese: 其次，男女比例不一致有利於班級紀律和學習成效。

sentences.english: Yes，I was the class commissary in charge of studies.
sentences.chinese: 有，我曾擔任班級學習委員。

sentences.english: We read the book in both class in Snow Lake and Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 我們在雪湖和洛杉磯的兩個班級都閱讀這本書。
這個班級的人都在忙着翻譯蒙田。

sentences.english: The project involves creation of documents for the course and the class-room at the Milan headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 該項目涉及的課程和班級在米蘭總部廳文件的創建。

sentences.english: However, you can still choose to be waitlisted for the classes that you want.
sentences.chinese: 但是，你還是可以選擇在你喜歡的班級後補名單裏。

sentences.english: In October, I will teach a class on Epistemology.
sentences.chinese: 十月份我將教一個班級的認識論課程。

sentences.english: The teacher's colleagues taught his classes while he was ill.
sentences.chinese: 這位老師的同事們在他生病時教他的班級。

sentences.english: Waht class are you in? I'm in Class Four Grade Seven.
sentences.chinese: 你在哪個班級？我在七年級四班。用英語怎麼翻譯。

sentences.english: When I reached this point, I knew that it was the last thing I was going to say to my class.
sentences.chinese: 當我編到這裏，我知道這是我給班級講的最後一部分。

definition: to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
